title: EXT Racing Shox Opens EXT USA Suspension Distribution Center in SLC
content:
On July 1, Italy’s Extreme Racing Shox announced it’s coming to America. The brand introduced its handmade suspension products to the U.S. by opening an EXT USA distribution arm in Salt Lake City that will handle sales and service. “There’s no question that EXT’s mountain bike products, notably the Storia V3 shock and Era fork, […]

The post EXT Racing Shox Opens EXT USA Suspension Distribution Center in SLC appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Sam Anderson
